name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Penly For PC,windows and Mac(100% Safe)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Penly For PC allows users to input tasks with detailed descriptions using a rich text editor

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our"Penly for Pc" Simplify daily task reporting effortlessly. Seamlessly prepare, organize, and export task details to Excel. Enjoy a user-friendly interface for efficient task management on Windows and Mac. Get organized with Penly – your go-to solution for streamlined productivity.

Penly Extension Features:

1) Through this, you will be able to easily prepare the daily task report. 

2) You can write everything here, including Task Title, Task Details, Start Date, End Date, and Status, and then alongside that, you can export it to an Excel sheet.

3) Easy To use

4) Simple Extension


✅ How To Use Penly on PC?


Step 1: Start by adding this extension to your Chrome browser by clicking "Add to Chrome."

Step 2: Next, click on the Extension icon.

Step 3: You will see :

You can effortlessly generate your daily task report here. Enter all pertinent information such as Task Title, Task Details, Start Date, End Date, and Status, and then seamlessly export it to an Excel sheet.

Step 4: Enjoy a safer browsing experience!

✅ Disclaimer:

Please note that "Penly for PC, Windows, and Mac" Chrome Extension is an independent product and is not associated, affiliated, or endorsed by the Penly Android app or its developers. We respect intellectual property rights and make no claim to any copyrights associated with the Penly Android app.
